title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Jake Paul "I want to fight a real boxer"
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Jake Paul "I want to fight a real boxer"
description:
It's the first podcast of this new year, and it's a good one. Dan Rafael from World Boxing News has his own newsletter over at substack, he stops by to run through all the news of the last couple of weeks. They dive into what's ahead for Canelo and for Ryan Garcia, and all the big-name fighters that are now looking for their first fights of 2022. Later, the very polarizing Jake Paul sits down with Chris to talk about his big impact on boxing and what Jake hopes 2022 looks like moving forward.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
